EmailTemplate.subject: Améliorez votre santé
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Améliorez votre santé physique et mentale en offrant à vos employés des postes de travail assis-debout qui permettent de passer de la position assise à la position debout, et vice versa, tout au long de la journée. <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> En savoir plus <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Je désire magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/fr/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSMAY19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
